content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out of the airplane's window when out of nowhere a large, rocket-shaped ufo appeared.  it was right outside of my window moving at a slow, steady pace.  it was as large as the wing of the plane with a metallic body, a silver nose, and without wings.  it was very close to the top of the plane and flew directly over my head.  behind it was a white stream of smoke. i do not think anyone else noticed it, as most people were sleeping or focused on something else.  because i didn't want to alarm anyone, i did not go to the other side of the plane to see it.  i was not sure what i saw, so i didn't say anything until i realized what i saw was, in fact, a ufo.

i will mail my sketches
content.summary: The object appeared out of nowhere in the sky from an airplane window.  it was gold with a silver nose, no wings, and moved slowly over the top of the airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I live in pittsburg california.  at about 6:55 pm i was on my way to the grocery store headed east on frontage road with my 10 year old daughter. i noticed two brigt reddish orange lights moving slow above highway 4, railroad exit, thought it was helicopters, and i ask my daughter what is that? i do not hear any noise, like a helicopter sounds. i noticed these objects, two,  turning west very slowly, so i made a u-turn and told my daughter that i wanted to get the binoculars from our home, i noticed the objects were above my vehicle like they were following us? when we arrived at home, i asked my daughter to get her father and and my 16 year old daughter.  we got the binoculars, my husband and my 10 year dauhgter both said it looked like balls of fire, and my husband said, there is three balls not two, at this time about 7:10pm the objects were abouve us while we were standing on the sidewalk.  when i tried to look at these objects, i only seen a second of one of them and it looked like a bright fire ball, then it dissapeared. my 16 year old tried to look thru the bionculars and could not see anything.  after i seen one dissapear, the other two followed after.  i did not think of a camera at the time, i was curious about the objects, what they were?  i did not know whom to call, i opened the phone book and called 911 non emergency and asked if there was any one i could call about this sighting, and if any one else had called obout it, the reply that the gentleman gave me was he had no idea whom i could call and that no one else had called in.  i then went on line to yahoo and located a number to call,it is called ufo north west, the gentlemans name is william puckett, phone# 1866-611-8367. my family and i looked up at the sky several times after to see if we could see anything, nothing.  then at 9:30 pm. my husband went out to have a cigar, then yelled, lisa, lisa, i see one again! it was east of our front yard, just one this time, i called my 16 year old daughter because i asked her to have her poloroid digital camera ready just in case, she took a picture of this object, had it zoomed in a 3x, i also called my neighbors a husband and wife and their two sons to see this object, they were able to see it for about ten minutes, then it dissapeard. when we looked at picture it looked like three objects instead one? immediatly i called mr.Puckett and emailed him the photo.He was kind enough to forward the information to the mutual ufo network.Hopefully someone in the city of pittsburg seen also what we saw and will report it. i have never seen anything like this before, my family and i were astonished by this sighting, we were quite excited to see what we believe was a ufo.
content.summary: Three round fireball circles moving in a row some feet apart very slowly,  thought it was helicopters at first.

content.detailedDescription:
my girlfriend, her mother, and i were driving east on rt 234(valley road), about to turn right onto what is known as the horseback road.My girlfriend was driving ,i was in the front passenger seat and her mom was in the back on the drivers side. we were in a chevy s10 blazer. as we were making the turn mom in the back,(who never curses) said loudly,"what the hell is that???"
 my girlfriend stopped the vehicle as she looked out the window. i leaned over to see and looked up .Beyond and above the trees which were still bare of leaves was a huge silver thing in the sky. it looked to be about 300 feet long and 50 or 60 feet thick. it filled the sky from my perspective ,and i estimate it was less than 1000 feet away. it had a pattern of lines on it that reminded me of the old jiffypop popcorn dome.It was so close that i could not see the entire object but i could see clearly underneath it and there was no lines or tethers, no gondola as on a hot air balloon, no cockpit or any kind of control surfaces. my girlfriend said that the top of the object had a reddish glow but i did not see this.
  as we looked my girlfriend took her foot off the brake and we started rolling,up the road. the object stayed motionless with absolutely no sound,and was very visible through the bare trees. as we moved on there was a row of evergreens that screened the sky for about 5 to 10 seconds when we could see that spot again the object was gone.
    one of the strange things is, i had a 35mm. camera right next to me on the floor, and i never thought to use it. also nobody in the vehicle felt like staying there to watch longer than we did, it was almost like something was saying "nothing to see here, move along." 
  we rode all the way to the end of that road still watching the sky for another glimpse,but nothing was said between us about it for over an hour. 
all of our descriptions matched when we did talk. i mentioned the sighting to a friend and he said that he and his sister had seen almost the same thing in the same place 3 years before.
  the next day i drove by the small pond that was under the spot we saw it,and there was a hole in the ice of the pond that looked to be around 30 feet across and appeared round from my perspective.  this was in late winter and this pond was frozen since december it was also frozen the next day.  for the next week or so there was a red bumpy rash on my left side that itched and burned and my side really hurt,like i had been kicked .
noone else had those symptoms.
   i have also seen many lights and other phenomena in the area ,as have others i have talked to who live in this valley. there are also episodes of missing time, that i have personally experienced,with some corroboration from others.
 feel free to contact me at the addresses listed, i can probably getthe others to talk to you as well but they don't live with me anymore.
 
      sincerely, steve camden
content.summary: Large silver oval hovering over pond ,3 witnesses,

content.detailedDescription:
I had arisen early, and had gone out to the front yard of my home. it was a nice late spring morning, the sun was up fairly well to the east, and there were no clouds in the sky. i glanced up, for whatever unknown reason, and saw an object, it appeared to be a craft without no fusilage, just a wing. from its rear and front trailing edges, there were rows of red flashing lights. but there was no sound, and i felt uneasy. later on i found myself in the kitchen at the rear of the house, and my father and mother were quite angry. i was told i had missed breakfast, and that they were looking for me and couldn't find me anywhere. i told them i had been in the front yard. my dad got angry and told me i was a lier because they had checked there and i was no where in the yard. i looked at the kitchen clock, at that time, because they were so angry with me. the clock showed 8:30am. to this day i do not know how where the time went, because i am sure that i had gone outside, at 6:30am. to this day, i often have vivid rememberances of that object i saw in the sky. i know i saw it and it was travelling from northeast to southwest. at the time i was eleven years old. i used to walk in my sleep at that age and my parents used to put a table knife in the door jamb so i could not walk outside the house. 
but i feel that i was not walking in my sleep, nor dreaming what i saw, and there was no knife in the doorjamb,i am sure of that.
content.summary: Noticed a slow moving object low in sky northeast of me

content.detailedDescription: 'my brother and i were travelling home from what was unfortunately our step-grandmother's wake when we saw three rather bright lights in a line to the left of the car.  i guess it was around 8:30-8:40 p.M.  it consisted of three bright white lights in a triangle with a red light positioned just behind the forward point.  the front light was brighter than the others.  the red light did not flash like one on a jet, but rather it pulsed fairly slowly, growing bright then fading out.  at its closest, its wingspan looked fairly consistent with orion's belt in the night sky, if not a little larger.  there was some noise associated with it, but if it was a jet, the noise was far too soft- almost just like wind blowing, and sometimes a low hum.  when we first witnessed the object, my girlfriend, who was following us in her car, called me about the time i reached for my phone to call her.  it was hard to miss.  the object stayed on our left side, thought the road turned a bit, but it did get almost directly overhead at one point.  as we passed under it, it was out of sight for a couple moments, then ended up along side us again travelling a completely different direction from when we first saw it.  a couple miles down, we parked to see if we could snap a picture of it on our camera-phones, but they're pretty usless for that sort of thing.  as we were parked watching it, it turned at almost a 90 degree angle and started heading away again.  this time, we decided to head home.  once we arrived there, we saw it cross overhead infront of us, head into the tree line.  it then turned away again and came into view, and it then came directly towards us, and when it was at about a 45 to 60 degree angle infront of us, it a sharp turn to the left and headed into the horizon- still heading away from the nearest airport or military base.  as i stated before, the sound was nothing like a jet, more like a steady rush of air as if from a fan.  my girlfriend and i left to run some quick errands, and my brother called me back to tell me he could hear the noise from inside the house, much louder this time, but when he got outside could not locate the object.  the reason it baffles me is that the nearest airport is 30+ miles away.   if it was a jet, it was very lost.  it was circling our little town randomly, making very un-jet-like turns.  ontop of that, as i stated before, there were no strobes, only the three brights and the one red pulse.  i hope this helps! good luck out there!
content.summary: Zig-zagging fly-by of town- ufo circling, crossing over its own path

content.detailedDescription: Too much to tell. too much to ask
content.summary: Contact  me

content.detailedDescription: Small eggshapped object over torrance moved like no airplane i have ever seen  about 20-30 ft above the ground zigzagged left and right.  saw a simular object today 1/15/07 same movement, very fast and zig zagging overhead
content.summary: See weired object in sky over torrance

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing by myself on the north end of lake perris, ca. i had been doing pretty well fishing, when i noticed a white light on the other side of the lake. i figuered it must have been another fisherman's lantern. the light appered to be moving slowly as though someone was walking with the lantern. all of a sudden i saw two bright red lights from the area where the lantern was. at first i thought who ever had the lantern was getting into their vehicle and leaving. it seemed strange (too big for a car or truck)so by this time i was entranced on the lights. they slowly moved up the side of the mountain and as it moved up it turned sidways and there it was, a cold black triangle shaped craft, the lights had become three light fading from red to amber almost pinkish. i watched the craft, which was probably 100 feet long in comparison with the background which is very familiar to me, move back down the side of the mountain and began hovering over the lake. it moved silently around skimming over the top of the lake. all of a sudden the red lights went dark and they were replaced by one very bright white light. at this time i heard the sound of something spinning, it made a wobbling sound that would speed up and slow down. this went on for sometime. i was very afraid of this thing, my hair was standing on end, there seemed to be a electrical or magnetic feild in the area, so i walked back up toward camp. i watched it for about ten more minutes, then all at once the lights and spinning sound was dead dark silence. i have had other experiances from that area if you guys are interested. this thing was for real.

i reported this on the national ufo repoting center some years back. looking back on the event i think the craft was a lot larger then reported.
content.summary: I saw a triangle shaped craft hovering over the lake with a very bright white light making a wobbleling spinning sound

content.detailedDescription:
I have camped out around this area for the past thiry years and have done numerous extended backpacking trips----as high as three weeks at a time.I have seen many things i cannot explain other than it was an un identified flying object. but always at night.

the fishing has been so good for years in this place that a friend of mine has made this quite the gathering spot for us men who never grew up.
last year, there was at the height, 85 of us camped out in a canyon 4 miles north of the town of bridgeport, california.Just over the hill from hawthorne, nevada. about twelve years ago, our campsite then was in a canyon along the little walker river. just one canyon south of the marine camp and we were "buzzed" by them on their night manuever's with their blacked out and relatively quite helicopters.

i have seen an entire mountain range glow from two bright objects that did things no helicopter could and then flew out towards space and dissapeared at an incredible speed without making a sound.

on a beautiful, clear, calm day a group of about 15 of us did our traditional hike to an alpine lake (emma lake)on the eastern crest of the sierra.Three of the next generation (one an ex-marine)had brought snowshoes and snowboards and hiked to the top of emma peak (3208 m) and those still at the lake were just fishing and following their progress when this absolutley huge thing came into view from behind emma peak and glided accross the distant horizon. i, like an idiot, had a camera around my neck but instead of taking a picture of it, all i did was question the two guys right next to me what they thought it was. i yelled at the group accross from us who had their backs to this, to look up and tell me what they thought it was.They were too close to the steep hillside and could not see anything. the guy on my right said he had binoculars in his backpack and i started digging through it while still questioning these two guys if they heard anything and what they thought they were looking at. the guy on my left said he heard a plane and i pointed at the plane flying 4 miles just east of us  and said yeah you hear that plane but what about that thing up there? the first thing i dug out was his camera and got it out of the case only to see it was not the binocs and by the time i got his binocs, i saw this thing for only long enough to say it was not like any blimp i have ever seen. and it slowly drifted behind the mountains going to the crest of the sierras.

the total to travel this approximately mile long horizon visible through the saddle was just about 2 1/2 minutes. just a stroll in the park. from the beginning of the sighting until it dissappeared. how or if it crossed over the sierras is beyond me. 

by the size of the trees (thirty feet tall) in the saddle that you could see this object through, our best guesstimation of the size of this would be well over 300 feet long. (two trees at it's width) at one time, it nearlly filled half the sky seen through the saddle in the mountain. it was shaped more like a cigar than a blimp and flying on a slight tilt in the direction it was headed. it could have been a disc seen only on it's edge. but it was not like any blimp i have ever seen. and it had to be just skimming the mountains.Barely clearing the range.

only a fool flies that low in the sierras and during the same time a high flying eastern bound jet (30,000 feet?) could be heard as well as the single engine plane flying around 10,000 feet going north to south following us highway 395. between the mountain ranges. this thing was travelling west bound right up the little walker river canyon not more than a mile away from us and not making a sound.

there were no windows. no bottom carriage. no rear stabilizers.No markings. it appeared to have a stubby small wing-like object in the middle. and by small, this is relative as it would have been huge, as big as a single engine plane would not this object itself been so big. the wing was visible easily with the binoculars. no exhaust. no lights blinking. no red on the right returning. it just kind of shimmered.Like glowing mercury. kind of like the objects (toys) you could hold up to a light source and they glowed. 

the three who saw this could not say what we saw this day.
content.summary: A very large, silent, silvery object flew slowly by the crest of the sierras. no sound was made and we could hear a very high jet and an airplane in the distant but thi thing made no noise as it glided low and slow over this point near the sonora pass.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a break at work! i worked in the shipping and receiving department! i was looking out the large shipping office window about 4:30 in the morning when i looked up and noticed a red flashing light in the sky! it was a clear night, and as i looked at it i noticed it was staying in one spot. i kept my eyes on it, not knowing what it was!
as one who believes in ufos, i looked with great interest to see what would happen! the object appeared to be far away, and appeared to be large! it could have been about a mile away and at approximately a seventy degree angle from the horizon. but i wasn't guessing what it was at that moment. i was trying to keep an open mind! 
i had a strange feeling while i was watching it! it seemed like the flashing object was putting me into a trance! not that i know what a trance is like or anything, but i did feel my concentration was being impaired! anyways i wasn't about to fall asleep! i tried to focus more intently! 
as i looked on, i saw smaller lights moving quickly to the flashing red object from opposite directions! how many, i am not sure! it might have been about 20 smaller objects (than the red object). they looked like white lights and disappeared at the moment they reached the larger red light! after the 2 rows of lights were gone, the red light disappeared! it was like the red light was turned off. it didn't move from its' spot for the approximate 5 to 7 minutes i watched it in the sky.
after this event, i thought that the red object was a 'mother ship' signaling to other (smaller), ships and then moved on after all the ships in the area were back aboard. i am not sure what the lights were or what they meant, but if i was going to tell anyone, this is how i would describe it. this is the third time that i seen something in the sky that i thought was an unidentified object in the sky. i guess i'm just a good observer.
content.summary: A motionless, red flashing light in the sky!

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my cat out and since its still unseasonably warm here still, 54 degrees, i decided to step outde with my first cup of coffee. it was between 5am and 5:45 maybe even 5:30. i was facing northwest to north and i was looking up at the relative fast moving clouds. it was not totally overcast. i saw a very bright object, brighter than a plane but it did not illuminate the sky. it was a white light not a blinking one. i do look up qite a bit at the evening sky and know what a plane looks like and this moved much much faster than any jet i have ever seen. although it was the size of a plane traveling at a normal altitude it moved faster than anything i have ever seen. it moved from left to right and if i extended my arm the object could be covered with my thumb but traveled the distance of a yardstick if held in my hand. i noticed that it traveled in between clouds. maybe a shooting star, i don't know. the brightness and the speed made this unlike anything i have ever seen. probably explainable but i thought i would report it anyway just in case anyone else saw it. my feelings? glad that i had seen something unusual but it was probably shooting star or space debris reentering the atmosphere.
content.summary: Saw an object move very very fast between clouds, not a plane, too too fast

content.detailedDescription:
I lived at 25 martha eatonway, suite 2102 and this is where the event took place.The time can be closer tracked by rental records.
 first of all i do not drink (alchohol) or smoke. a few of us were hanging out at my place on this warm summer evening, when i noticed this very large ball of light outside the balcony window, i yelled for every one to look at this thing. i had the presence of mind to remove the screen as not to ipede my view of the light and stuck my head out the window. rolin, fred and myself all had our heads through that window in seconds. that light zoomed away from us in the direction of the pearson airport silently and disappeared within 6-7 mins.
content.summary: A large spherical silent glow

content.detailedDescription: I was in peewee hockey and often walked to arena and on that nov day there was no snow on ground but a heavy frost. i lived on the canadian forces airbase formally known as uplands. i was walking alone in a field on base property and was a little afraid of dark and decided to look for stars to occupy my time. i suddenly noticed very bright ( like led white) light off to my left and noticed 3 black out areas were visible. no sound was emitted at all and the object came to complete stop and hovered at tree top level as if to observe me. after a few seconds it took off at high rate of speed to low level cloud layer. i left running...And this is were it gets wierd..I have no memory of playing hockey that day. the object impressed with its speed and no sound at all and the sharpness of the blacked out areas in the ufo with the middle squared shaped and the two outer ones like a square tilted slightly to follow the conture of the shape of the ufo. i was very familar with most aircraft at that age and went on in later life to become a military air traffic controller. i never told anyone to this date about the memory loss, but did convey the event of the ufo i saw. i was so close that i really had the impression that it stopped to look at me and then left in must faster than originally flying along when i first observed it...No sound barrier broken.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying low level-fast-then came to complete stop- then departed to clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home, from at that time my girlfriends house to my parents home where i was living at the time. i was 22 years old. this event occurred in southwest wayne co., mi. which was at that time and still somewhat is suburban/rural. i was travelling west on sibley rd., and had just crossed u.S. 24, known as telegraph rd. i was in a line of 4 cars, the first three in a group approx. 100 feet long, the forth back about an 1/8 of a mile behind. we had a green light, traversed the 'crown' of the cross st. and continued west about 1/8th of a mile. to my immediate right, somewhat on the outer peripherery of my line of sight, i saw a light travelling at a high rate of speed at approx. a 35 degree angle downword. it was behind a patch of woods about 200-300 feet to the north of the road i was on.  i had grown up and lived all my life at that time exactly 6 miles due south of detroit-metro airport, i imediately thought, "well i'm about to see my first plane crash". at that same instant i lost sight of the object for no more that 2-3 seconds, then i saw it begin a slow climb over the trees at a very step angle. also, it was coming at an angle back towards me, in other words not only had it changed altitude at a very steep angle, it also did an incredible change of direction from due west downward to very near the ground below the tops of the trees, to now climbing at a steep angle and travelling south-southeast. as it crossed the street i was on, it was going no more than 30 mph at a height of no more than 200 feet. i was the third car in a line of 4 cars, and i noticed that both cars in front of me had stopped, as well as myself, and i had pulled somewhat over with 2 tires on the shoulder, and 2 tires still on the road. i had my window down about 3 inches, as i was a smoker at that time, yet as this craft crossed the road no more than 100 feet ahead of me and continued s-se, it made absolutely no noise. i did feel what i have described as a vibration or hum in my sternum/chest, but no noise. i had to 'cran' my neck to my extreme left to continue to track it. when it was about 150 ft to my left/rear and about 200 ft high, it stopped and just hovered. again, no noise. i got a good look at this craft. it was metallic, but i couldn't say if it was gray or not due to the poor ambient light. it's shape was round or oval but it had a distinct flat end to it. the best way to describe it would be if you had a round or slightly oval sting ray fish, and you chopped off 1/3 of it. it was about 40ft. in circumference, and about 9-11 ft high. it had some type of bubble or 'hump' in the middle, about 10 feet around and perhaps 3 ft. high, which looked to be made of a slightly different material or color, which appeared to be in the exact middle of the craft. upon the 'hump' was a red light that glowed bright, then dim ,bright, dim. it did not shut off or strobe , just sort of increased and then decreased in intensity. the thing that struck me most was, there was a red light and a green light that appeared to be port and starboard markers, which seemed to be approx 2-3 feet up on either side of the top surface, on a type of post or mast. they did not blink or change in intensity, they were not very bright, but they were red and green for sure. the flat'end' or rear of this craft,had three hugh white lights,(they were about 3 feet in diameter) that seemed to be flashing in some type of code or pattern, each of the 3 would flash in an independant pattern. my thought was that this was the rear or propulsion part of this craft, but i'm not sure of that. it hovered yet this flashing pattern continued. i observed this for no more than 5-7 sec of hovering time, when the forth car slowly passed me. it seemed that that driver was not aware of why the 2 cars and myself were stopped there, but when that car passed me, it drew my attention to the road ahead of me, at which time i realized that the 2 autos ahead of me had also left, as all i saw were taillights ahead of me. i glanced back at the craft, and i became aware that it was just me and this thing there at that time, and i'm not proud to say, but i felt very apprehensive and scared and i floored it and left the craft hovering there. as far as i know, it did not follow or tail me, and i have no idea how long it remained there. my thought at that time, after some reflection, which i still feel to this day, is that having grown up just a few miles from one of the largest airports in the country, and i must add i continued to live in that area until i was 42, and having seen almost every type of commercial and many military aircraft,(metro airport was a afng base when i was a child/teen) in every type of weather and time of day, altitude,etc. i can say for an absolute fact, and i would affirm with all that i am, that what i saw was not anything that i had seen before or since. i am not willing to say it had little green men, or grays or anything else in it, but i know it was not an identifiable craft, either in design or propulsion. i have often felt that perhaps it was a gov't. craft of some type, because of the 'port' and 'starboard' lights. also, one thing i remember is that our local weekly paper, the "news herald" reported that during that same time period there were numerous sightings, and even our local township police, (huron township, michigan)had spotted and followed a craft, and actually went into a ditch following one of these sighted craft. i am at work right now, so i cannot attach a sketch, but if you contact me and provide me with an address, i will mail you one i drew up.I wish i had contacted you years ago, but this event made such an impact on me it was like it happened last week. thank you, harry timothy slomers
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched craft descend very fast, pull up, cross road, hover at low altitude

content.detailedDescription:
There is an object in the sky, that is making no sound, moving extremely slow in a right to left and back again motion low in the sky.  we observed this for over 2 hours and also observed several planes flying by the object.  we noticed around 5 other object with only red and white lights moving just as slow, but they were at a much higher altitude.  we watched planes fly around them also.  we called some neighbors to go outside and observe them also.  we didn't have a telescope to look through so used out binoculars, and could definately make out the different colored lights on each craft, and also see the definate flashing pattern of the lights.  
  we quit watching after awhile because of the extreme cold.  each time we went out to look again, the crafts of objects were still there, they had just changed the place they were hovering.
content.summary: Bright blue, white and red lights

content.detailedDescription:
This happened about a year and 2 months ago, in november of 2005.  this essentially was the impetus which led to my initiation of ufo/et research, and this is why the report hasn't been filed until now.

it was about 10 p.M. on approximately november 15, 2005.  i can't recall the precise date and i didn't write it down.  i was with my friend driving to tim horton's (coffee chain) and something above in the night sky caught my attention as we drove through the neighbourhood to get to the coffee shop.  at first i thought i saw a plane or helicopter but i kept staring at it and it seemed to be stationary and did not have blinking lights or lights in the standard setting that a plane or copter would have equipped.  it had these 4 steady blue-white lights that were in a square formation on the bottom.  what struck me as bizarre is that it was very low to the ground- about 250-300 feet.  

curious, i asked my friend to stop his truck.  i got out of the truck and stared straight up at this thing.  it was completely silent and moving very slowly above.  my friend stayed in the truck but was staring at the object.  more info on the craft:  i looked carefully and could see a black circular silhouette with those four blue lights in a square pattern.  they were not shining brightly but had this strange conistent glow to them, unblinking and not glittering.  i watched in awe at this thing as it completely silently (it was quiet on the road we were on) passed overhead.  it eventually passed behind a spruce tree so i ran over the side of the tree to get a better view.  about 5 more seconds passed with the object in full view, and then it did a right turn and shot off incredibly fast- about 10 times the speed it was going.  it did a 90 degree turn and shot off out of view.  after this happened i had an intense mix of fright, excitement and... emotions that i can't really describe with words.  to be honest it was really shocking and scary to see what happened but incredible at the same time.   what i remember about the craft is that it was circular and black.  the four lights did not light up the underside.  they seemed succinct and had this strange steady glow to them.  i have attached a paintbrush picture.
content.summary: Silent craft passes overheard, and then shoots off with 90 degree turn at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Hitching from toronto to winnipeg, my thumbing partner, doug, found ourselves along the transcanada highway somewhere near sudbury (within 150 miles). it was a cool summer day with very large clouds which were 2000 feet tall at least, fluffy white tops and very dark, spread out bottoms. there were many openings in there clouds in which we could see clear blue sky. i recall that it had sprinkled a bit just before we were dropped off from our previous ride.
the area we were at had many bluffs of deciduous trees with hay fields winding in-between the trees.  there was a 3 or 4 strand barbed wire fence on the other side of the ditch all along the highway on the north side and the south side was all bush that we could see.
on this day there were not made cars going either way on the highway and as we sat and had a smoke while we waited, we were wondering if we should get rain gear out of our packs because, judging by the clouds, it could rain at any time. as we spoke, we were both scanning the sky and that is the time when we saw it.
i saw the craft just as the nose of it appeared about 800 - 1000 yards away as it very slowly came out of a cloud. at first, i thought of a hot-air balloon as it was absolutely noiseless and moved at about the same speed. then, i thought it looked like 737 for a moment, but it was hanging there and hardly more that 1000 feet in the air, then realized i was looking at something with a row of windows down the portion i could see.
it was at this time that i looked towards doug. as he looked at me, i could see the fear in his eyes. he said, "lets get out of here", but i said, "no, don't move", as i looked back at the object.
as i focused back on the object, i noticed that all lot more of it was outside the cloud by now.  the front of it appeared to be pointed, and it was huge.  the area that i could see had to be hundreds of feet long (the right-hand side of the ship), and the row of windows (almost like looking at the side profile of a 747 aircraft) appeared to be backlit. then i noticed that there were shadows in the windows and that the shadows moved around. at this time i saw that it humanoid shaped shadows, and that they (approx 20 or so) appeared to be walking along a hallway just inside. as i looked more closely, i saw two of these shadows stop at one of the windows. they stopped, and appeared to be talking, when one of them turned and looked out the window towards us. immediately, the other one turned towards us also. when i saw this i said "oh, shit" and just as i spoke the words, i heard the screeching sound of something running into a barbed wire fence and as i whipped around to see what it was.... that is the last i remember until after.
i came to a split second later, falling over and on doug as we tumbled down the side of the ditch along the highway. when we came to a stop at the bottom, we knew something major had just happened. there was nothing in the sky anymore, but the strangest thing was the screech i had heard before was doug as he jumped over the fence and said he was about halfway to the nearest bluff of trees when it happened, and i had been still standing on the highway( at least 50 feet from each other), and yet when we came to a split second later, we were on top of each other partway down the side of the ditch.
it took days until we could understand what happened. i have some memories of what when on and so does doug.
they had taken both of us into that spacecraft! 
my memory is of being on a sort of hospital bed and of someone leaning over me with a long hypodermic needle and sticking it into the centre of my eye.
doug remembered a lot more about what happened than i did and he was terrified. he had nightmares for months after. we agreed that based on the section of the ship that we could see ( which could have been more than the wing span of a dash 8 airplane, based on the assumption that the dark humanoid shapes were the actual size of us humans) it could have easily been only one-half or even one-quarter of the whole thing. i have seen a number of documentaries on tv about different types of et craft, but have never seen this huge dart-like shape anywhere. it was a small city.
we returned to toronto in the hopes of telling someone, but even the cops didn't what to hear of any of that stuff at the time. then we discovered that each of us had a souvenir of our experience. doug discovered a mysterious lump under the skin on his hand. at that time i mentioned that i had a lump too, only mine was put on my chest! we both have implants.
my implant has puzzled many doctors over the years as it show an x-rays, bone scan and mri. they said it must be metal in me. about 10 years ago a doctor was going to make a small incision to remove this metal, when he stopped and called an other doctor into the room, and he concurred; the thing under my skin actually moved away every time the doctor even brought the scalpel near the protrusion.
over the years this lump (about 1/4 inch wide to 1/2 inch long appearing oblong at times, otherwise rounded) and will get very big at times, so big that it shows through light shirts, then will shrink until barely noticeable at other times. i have known what this is and have carried it for years, still where they put it.
please help! i want this removed and will give this implant to anyone who would want it for research.
content.summary: Two taken from side of highway onto craft - implants

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 4:15 am because my outside dog was barking and that was very unusual unless there was somebody there.  i looked out the window to look for the dog and i saw a bright white object through the pine trees.  it was very bright and it wasn't up very high in the sky, i was gauging where the object was exactly by where it was in relation to the tree branches.  i watched for about 15 minutes when i decided to run downtairs and get the binnoculars.  the object was so bright i could not make out the exact edges but i could see lights coming out from the top intwo different directions (like attennas going in different directions but i could not describe an exact shape) the object did move but very slowly, it drifted upward and to the right of the tree and as it got lighter in the sky it floated up until it was a dot in the sky at aroung 5:30 a.M. when it was light enough to see i looked at the tree branches to see exactly where i saw the light first and it was in front of one of our mountains called black mountain (it is on the very outskirts of kelowna where not many people live.  i told my husband and children what i saw the next day and was very spooked about the experience.  i phoned a t.V.Station and newspaper to ask if anyone had reported a light and one fellow told me it was venus.  i thought it could be possible so a few nights later i got up at 4:30 a.M. so i could verify in my mind if this light was venus but to my surprise when i looked out the window hoping to again see the light it was black.  i was quite  upset to think what i saw may have been a ufo.  i went back to bed and when i awoke a couple hours later i walked out to our driveway to get our daily paper and to my surprise the front page had a picture of a crop circle that had been found in a nearby field.  the crop circle was the same shape as the light that night and the crop circle was found july 31.  i started screaming for my daughter to take a look at the paper and she was also very freaked out looking at the paper and seeing in print what i had been describing to my family for days.
content.summary: Bright white sphere shaped

content.detailedDescription:
i was an air trafic control officer working the early morning shift at the rcaf training base just outside the city of moose jaw sask. as a traing base we opened the tower at 5 am. the first flight of the day was a weather flight to determine the base of clould and the tops. we had just launched buzzard one and the pilot reported the base of cloud at 16000 ft he soon reporteon top at 23000 and was given an eta to the tacan at a time. this info was passed to the briefing room for the students. the assisant and me were looking south when out of the ground  to the east we witnesed a hugh ball of fire climbing on a constant angle to the ground. it was trailing a hugh multi coloured flame of many colours. it was moving so fast that we only saw it for maybe 5 sec.Before it entered cloud far to the west of moose jaw.At this time i called buzzard one and reported the object as traffic. the pilot saw  nothing. the land line phone to the civilian tower at the regina airport lit up and when i answered the phone the controller there asked me what i had seen. we discussed each others story. the object was first sighted by regina somewhere around the man. sask. border and was seen entering the base of cloud west of mj. the land area from man. to alta. is around 400 miles and after talking to regina again and from where the object entered cloud it couvered 400 miles in about 5 seconds.I went back to the pilot and gave a much greater briefing on what had happeened and he proceded west on top but saw nothing. this was all logged in the tower log and was passed on to base higher ups. nothing more came back to me or my assistant. end of story 

i have one moreand will pass it on after hearing from you.
content.summary: A multi coloured ball of flame, much like a jet eng with a rooster tail. could be afire ball moving from the ground at a 40 degree angle at speeds in excess of mach 4. a guess.

content.detailedDescription:
I worked at the union pacific railroad terminal in denver, co as a switchman in the yard that day and after work i decided to sit under the bridge next to the railyard terminal to wait for my friend to get off his shift. as i took a seat under the bridge, i happened to gaze up and saw a helicopter fly by at approximately 2,000 ft. i knew it was a helicopter because of the lights flashing on it and i could see the outline of the copter as well as the rotorblades turning. plus it was moving below the cloud deck in a straight westward movement. i am also very adept at identifying aircraft, as i was an airborne aircraft controller and surveillance operator for 20 years in the air force. planes have always been a passion of mine and i have over 7,000 inflight hours in the e-3a awacs and ec-130e. i am also very aware of weather baloons, fighter aircraft, uavs and stealth technology through my experiences in the air force. 

i then happened to lean my head back onto the bridge pillar when my eyes became fixed on a small black dot stationary in the sky. it was floating right below the cloud deck at approximately 5,000 ft. my first thought was why aren't there any lights flashing off of it.  i know that all aircraft are supposed to have lights flashing on them to alert other pilots of their position. this object appeared to be floating right at the bottom of the clouds as it periodically would enter a cloud and then reappear. i knew this was strange, but also felt that my eyes were playing tricks on me. so i decided to take my eyes off of the object for a few seconds and then see if i could find it again. sure enough, i was able to find it with ease. again i watched it closely, to see if i could distinguish what it was but all i saw was a small black circular object. 

i then took my eyes off of it several times to see if my eyes were playing tricks on me again, but i found it easily time and time again. as the denver airport was not too far away, i could see other aircraft moving on the horizon, some even farther away than this object was, but i could clearly see they were aircraft as their lights were flashing and they were manuevering. i did this for comparison to see what the differences were between this object and known aircraft in the area. 

after a few more minutes, the object faded up into the clouds and disappeared. i stayed to see if the object would still be there when the cloud rolled by, but it wasn't. it was clearly gone and i truly believed i had witnessed something out of the ordinary and unexplainable.  when my friend finally arrived, i couldn't contain my excitement and told him what i saw. he told me it was time to go get a beer! 

i am very confident that this object was not a balloon of any sort as it was not moving with the wind nor was it there when the clouds finally moved on. it was not a helicopter or any other aircraft as it was not flashing any lights like the other aircraft in the sky and it was not properly flying by vfr rules. it remained stationary as the clouds rolled through it and then it appeared to go up into the clouds and disappeared. this even happened in the middle of the day at approximately 1530 hours so visibility was good. because of this incident, i find that i am watching the skies a lot more closer.
content.summary: Black circular object hovering below clouds at approx 5,000 feet

content.detailedDescription: First of all, this was 1 year ago, first at the end of december 2005 and then again within the first week of january 2006. my wife, 8yr. old son and i were driving home and i noticed a bright orange object flying in the normal route of airplanes that take off and turn and then head south. i assumed at first it was an airplane but because of the bright orange glow i joked to my family "look there's a ufo". this was actually just a joke not even being serious myself. we drove for a few more seconds and my son said "daddy, the ufo's dropping fire". and of course i thought he was playing along and i was like "yeah right you're really funny" . and then when my wife said, "he's serious, the thing's dropping fire from underneath. so at that time we were just turning  right on atlantic avenue and i looked to my right and saw the thing still heading south. i didn't pull over yet but they kept looking at it. we were almost home. anyhow so i turned left on avenue g and actually pulled over and rolled my window down and the thing looked as if it wasn't moving although it could have been traveling away from us but it looked like it wasn't moving and fire would come out of this thing. the best way to describe it was: deliberate. this was not any kind of aircraft with electrical problems causing sparks. the fire would come down. obviously for it to be fire, something had to be "on fire" but whatever it was it would just dissipate after falling hundreds of feet. by the way this was over rural suburbs. not subdivisions(although it did fly over subdivisions at first but where it was actually dropping fire, there was houses below, not many but nonetheless-houses. it wasn't fire shooting out the bottom. it wasn't a beam. it could have been a solid object or a group of small objects being let go at once. but the point is this "spec" of fire would fall and fall and fall and then just disappear before it hit the ground. then a few seconds would go by and nothing. then another fire thing would come out. the truth is i was angry when this was happening because it appeared so deliberate that i was afraid that somehow, even though the fire disappeared before it hit the ground that it would somehow catch someone's house on fire. i was very upset about this. so altogether there were about 5-10 of these things that dropped out. i contacted the airport authority to see if they knew anything about a distressed plane. they said there were no reports of any kind. the next day i contacted a "hotshot" forest fighter. he told me that during forest fires they drop fire things that are used to fight the fire somehow by diverting it but that there's no chance that these things would be used so near a town and especially when there's no forest fire. i contacted an airplane mechanic that told me that it did not sound like fog "seeding" because the seeding is a white color. i agreed with him because there was no fog that night. there was low clouds though, both times we saw them. i contacted the faa in portland. they were kind of like" well who knows what you saw". they actually told me about mufon at that time but i didn't know you guys investigated. i would have loved to talk to you about it but after the faa guy didn't seem too interested i figured nobody would be. we contacted the radio station. it is 1400am located in medford, or. that's only a few miles from white city. they invited us on the next morning to tell people what we saw. we didn't use our last name on the program, just the real first names. i found 2 other accounts of people seeing this same exact described object in 2003. july i think, in concord, ca.Ultimately both times we lost sight of the object as it moved upward and disappeared. by the way, the second time we saw it we had actually just got home and got out of the car. on this occasion i actually ran to my front door, unlocked it ran to the office with my shoes on which is breaking the no-shoe rule grabbed the camcorder, ran outside. i had plenty of minutes of film available but of course the battery was virtually dead. for the last year i've been hoping to see it again. i always have my camcorder ready but what are the odds i'll see it again. we do have an airforce base about 80 miles to the east, but why would they drop fire over people's houses if it is classified? thanks for your time.  you can ask my wife or son of 10 now what they saw too. (my son is the one who actually spotted the fire-dropping craft both times)
content.summary: Bright- orange silent object  moving slowly dropping fire out of underneath object with fire dissipating after roughly 300 ft. object flying near 2,000 ft high

content.detailedDescription:
Cool crisp night. went out to stand on my patio with my former son-in-law to get some air after moving a lot of boxes. clear night with lots of stars. this was very close to the dorval international airport, now called pierre elliott trudeau airport. we were facing west, just standing there. 

all of a sudden we both saw four round yellowish lights above us - can't remember if initially they were moving slowly or not moving. then they moved, or started to move, very, very slowly to the north (to our right). i think what made us first notice these things was that 1) they seemed low so as to be seen from the "corner" of our eyes, and 2) with it being such a beautiful night i naturally wanted to look up at the stars.

what did i think it was when i first noticed? immediately ufo came to mind.. what "type" of unidentified flying object, i didn't know, but nothing i'd ever seen before. i knew it was most unusual.

they were not pinpoint lights, like stars. there were two and then a bigger space, then another two - i.E., four in a row: one, then a space, then one, then a bigger space, then one with the same smaller space as between the first two, then one. couldn't tell if it was four objects, or two, each with two lights. the lights were not bright like airplane lights. there was no sound, no vibration, no wind, no markings on them. they moved slowly to the north, then the two on the left side took off together at an astonishing speed, to the north. a couple of seconds later the other two lights, together, took off in the same direction at the same astonishing speed.

---i realize this was over 20 years ago, but i've always wondered about it and would like to know if you're aware of any other reports from that night. i went into the house and immediately wrote an account of it, which i still have.

because the night sky was black, it was very hard to get perspective, so i can't say if they were close to the ground, although i think so, or if they were very big things and high up.

right after all four lights took off, i looked way down at the sky westward and saw a very thin red line of light pointing in our direction. it looked like a laser, that's the only way i can describe it.

we were absolutely spellbound. neither of us blinked, moved, nudged each other or said to each other "hey, did you see that?". i also think we didn't even breathe, not wanting to miss a second of it.

my former son-in-law said he "felt" like they (the four lights) had come into our atmosphere, then left. i didn't see them coming, but i sure saw them going at lightning speed.

the next day i had a bad intestinal upset, which kept me running to the bathroom (sorry, don't want to be graphic). i was to start a new job that day at 4:00 p.M. and was worried that i might not be able to go. i did though - the upset lasted for a only few hours in the early part of the day. i have very rarely ever gotten upsets like that.

i have never forgotten this, and i'm really interested to know if you've ever heard of this. i remember, although this part i did not write down, that somebody told me the next day that there had been reports on the radio of people seeing what we'd seen.

do you have any information? it would be much appreciated. thanks.

cathy o'brien
content.summary: Four pale round yellowish lights moving slowly, then two taking off at extremely high speed, then the other two.

content.detailedDescription: Hello i will make this as clear as possible.Me and my 2 sons were playing catch in the front yard we live in very small comunity 15 houses out in the country in eastern p.E.I. airliners fly right over and east of our house going gander nfld at least i think so anyway my young fella hollerd whats that dad pointing at the sky i looked and saw only a jet leaving contrail and i said jet and he said no that and my other son saw it as well and bot were pointing probaly half mile behind the jet and there was a gold i would say round or oval ufo to tell the truth i would never have noticed it if it was not pointed out to me.We watched it fly into this jet smoke right up to the jet and went either under  or over jet and kept on going of course by his time the 3 of were on the roof straining our eyes i had ladder on the side of the house i think fixing satalite dish or somthing earier on . this jet never alterd course this you could tell by the straight line of smoke to tell the truth my mouth was opnd so far my throat was sore for days i know these pilots must have seen this thing pass them but never heard anything when my wife arrivedhome we told her this as well.I tried to phone canadian air force but kinda to no avail to tell the truth idid not try that hard as i said we live in a small area and we have to work and the lads have to go to school. as i said it just flew out of site this only took about maybe 5 or 6 minutes this mayor may not matter but at the time cnada was flying in refugees at the time from somewhere i think. my boys were aged 10 and eleven at the time and we still talk about it now and then this thing was gold in color at least thats what i remember thanks
content.summary: Gold color

content.detailedDescription: The object was not discovered until i chose the photo for my desk top display.  i noticed a small object int the photo and upon enlarging the object could not figure out what it was.  i never actually witnessed the object!  what do you think?
content.summary: Noticed object in photo taken 18 monts ago.

content.detailedDescription: We were having a new years eve party, sitting outside by a fire, when my friend said look at the satellite. i looked up and seen a very bright light moving pretty fast across the sky. i dont think i was a satellite because it seemed to be to close to earth and moving to fast. never seen anything like it before other than a plane but there was no blinking lights and it was moving to fast to be a plane. it was moving in a straight line. as we watched, what looked like lights started shooting out of the side right side of it. we watched until we lost sight of it because of the two story houses in the area.  about 20 minutes later we could seen it coming again. this time as it pasted over it started shooting red lights out of the front.  i am not sure what we seen but if anyone has any ideas or seen it that night please let me know.
content.summary: Bright round ball, shooting while lights from side red lights from front.

content.detailedDescription: on the evening of the sighting three of us were returning to the sugarloaf ski resort from a trip to the store.  it was about 8:40pm we parked our vehicle in the parking lot and started to walk to our hotel when one of us spotted the lights in the clear night sky. at first we thought maybe it was the northern lights since we were so far north, but two of us have seen the northern lights before and this didn't have the same characteristics. there was a central set of bright white lights high in the sky which were shaped in a diamond formation. there were 4 sets of lights surrounding the diamond set like strands, three were whitish and one band was goldish.   we proceeded to walk towards the hotel when i spotted a local police officer, i asked him if he was familiar with the northern lights and if this could be it.  he said it did not look like it, that many ufo's are seen up here.  we went into the hotel to retrieve a camera, we came back out just a few minutes later. the peripheral strands were gone and the diamond shaped seemed to be going higher in the sky and getting dimmer. we watched until it became too dim to see. we went back to the hotel after dinner and each of separately drew what we saw. i am unable to attach the drawings to this e-mail.
content.summary: Viewed diamond shape set of bright white lights high in the clear night sky, accompanied by 4 sets of smaller rows of various lights.

content.detailedDescription: I have never seen a ufo that i can remember, but have had strange things happen to me as a child when i thought i was safe in my bed. what follows has been haunting me ever since. i was a young boy, about 6 or 7 years old, living out in the country with my mom, dad and two brothers. my dad was in the air force and worked at offutt a.F.B. in bellvue, nebr. we lived probably 15 miles west out in the country near plattsmouth. i shared a room with my middle brother and was asleep in the top bunk while he was in the bottom bunk. i slept facing the wall on my right side, and still do, when all of the sudden i woke up, still facing the wall, and felt as if i was being watched. i slowly turned over only to come face to face with something. even though it was only 2 or 3 feet from my face, i could not make out its face. i could only see an outline of a head and what appeared to be part of a cape extending out from both sides of its head, reminded me of dracula. needless to say, i was petifried but heard or felt a voice say dont be scared, turn back over. so i did. facing the wall again, i was wide awake and scared shitless but dont know why i never called out for mom or dad. i dont know how much time passed, but i stayed looking at the wall and hoping whatever it was would just go away. finally, getting enough courage to turn around and look, i seen that whatever was there was gone. let me tell you, i never, ever made that trip to the bottom bunk faster than i did that night. flying through the air over my brother to get between him and the wall took seconds flat. he woke up wondering what the heck i was doing and i told him dracula was in our room. now both of us are awake and scared with the covers pulled up just below our chins. our bed was located in a way that when we were sitting up with our backs against the headboard, we could see out into the hallway. we both heard something in the hall and then silence. what happended next, i will never forget, a big green head with big eyes peered around the corner and looked at us and then was gone. we slowly looked at each other as if to say "did you just see what i saw?". needless to say we spent the rest of the night huddled there awake and waited till daylight. i know this happended during the winter, because we went outside the next day to look for footprints in the snow that was on the ground, but did not find any. to this day, i dont know why we didnt scream bloody murder for our parents as was the case when we would have a nightmare. i told our parents, but they said i dreaming. i wish i could remember more, if there is more, from that night. i have one more weird thing that happened to me but wont go into that now. growing up, i put these down as bad dreams but would always think about them from time to time. gradually they faded from memory until i happened upon a book in the library when i was about 16 or 17. it was about ufos and aliens. as i read it, i became engrossed and couldnt put it down, until i came to an artists rendering of what is now the classic grey. seeing that picture sent chills down my spine and scared me to where i put the book away only to get it out later because i couldnt stop thinking about it which brought me back to this night. about ten years ago, i brought up that night to my brother. he remembers something happened that night but doesnt recall much. i showed him a picture of an alien from a book and he probably thought me to be crazy so i havent mentioned it since even though i think about it time to time. i dont know if what i saw was an extraterrestrial, but i pretty sure it wasnt dracula and frankenstein!
content.summary: When i was a young child, i was awakened in my bed to see something looking at me.

content.detailedDescription: I am 13 ears old from romania and here in galati are meny strange objecects almost evrye week i soo so may ufo that i cant belive it al caind of forms betwen a car and a misile.14 nights i seen late in night tawsents of ufo betwen 12-3 a clok first i saw a strange form blu-wite like a jeep florescent very very fast,a fliing disc about 100 feet with a strange noise and every night i hear strange noises but i can see aniting,like a plasma misile wite rotating in speed

I was looking out my window in the early morning, and i happened to look up and a round "disc" like flying object zoomed (cant think of a different description) into the sky extremely fast. then, completely stopped over a tree that was across the street, behind a house. it stationary, but it was spinning in place. while it was spinnging, there was a big, blue, diamond shaped light and it was very bright. as i kept looking at the light i noticed that the ship was beautiful. it was the brightest silver i have ever seen and it was perfectly clean not one spot. there were windows on it, i could see them, but i couldnt focus in on it enough to see inside of them. i wouldnt say that i was scared when i saw it, i would probably say i was more stunned than anything. my eyes got big as i saw it fly into the sky. 

before i saw it, i was sitting in my room next to my window. i  had starting the news. there was nothing interesting on so i looked out my window. i was probably staring for like 2-3 mintutes and then i saw it "zoom" into the sky. i automatically thought that it was a ufo once i first saw it. at that time i was thinking, "am i seeing things?". after about 45 seconds to a minute of staring at it, it flew out of the sky very fast.
content.summary: Flat, round, flying object with a blue diamond shaped light on the front.
